meanings.sent1: The childless couple enjoyed a quiet evening at home.
meanings.sent2: She felt a bit sad being childless, but she focused on her career.
meanings.sent3: The childless garden gnome longed for little ones to play with.
meanings.sent4: The childless tree stood alone in the field, yearning for the laughter of children.
meanings.sent5: The childless house echoed with silence, devoid of the pitter-patter of little feet.

meanings.sent1: Their childless status allowed them to travel frequently.
meanings.sent2: The childless aunt spoiled her nieces and nephews with gifts.
meanings.sent3: The childless king had no heir to inherit the throne.
meanings.sent4: The childless desert seemed barren, devoid of any signs of life.
meanings.sent5: The childless classroom was quiet, lacking the usual chatter of students.
